answers: Flo performs an automatic leak test once a day in addition to constantly monitoring your daily water usage. In order to run the leak test, Flo shuts of your home water for 60 seconds in the middle of the night. The water will automatically be turned back on if you attempt to use it while the test is running. You are also able to run your own diagnostic leak test through the mobile app any time you wish from the Control Panel.
